title: Drawing, "Design for an Ash Tray with Millefiori Pattern", ca. 1925
medium: Brush and gouache, gold paint on cream wove paper
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right:  SIMON LISSOM; lower right corner:  SIMON LISSIM [underlined]
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left:  N 30.; upper right corner:  Ascher; center verso:  #17/Ash tray
description: Hexagonal tray with wide rim edged with two gold bands.  In center, small-scaled, multi-colored, millefiore-like pattern.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for an Ash Tray with Millefiori Pattern", ca. 1925.Brush and gouache, gold paint on cream wove paper. 1985-81-2.
